name: get_horoscope_multilingual
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool horoscopes_ai.
Tool description: Horoscopes by AI in multilingual.
API description: Fetches horoscope information in the specified language for a given sign, period, and type.

language.description:
en: English, 
zh-t: Chinese (transditional), 
zh-s: Chinese (simplified),
es: Spanish,
hi: Hindu,
fr: French,
ja: Japanese,
ko: Korean

period.description: The period for which the horoscope is requested (e.g., 'daily', 'weekly').

sign.description: The astrological sign for which the horoscope is requested (e.g., 'aries', 'taurus').

type.description: The type of horoscope information to be fetched, depending on the period. Use the **Get Types** method to get available types for the selected period.
